title: L3 Autonomous Driving Bonanza in China
description:
There’s been a flurry of announcements this week about L3 autonomous driving in China. I’ll get to them in a moment, but let’s first explain what L3 autonomous driving is. L2 autonomous driving is the driver-assist technology most automakers are deploying that we’re quite familiar with — lane keeping assist, ... [continued]
